header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 245-70r19.5 drivers
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 245-70r19.5 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 245/70R19.5 Tire Size
245/70R19.5 tires are typically found on commercial trucks, and their large size shows that they are able to carry heavy loads and perform in grueling conditions. A popular size in the commercial segment, 245/70R19.5 tires are available in drive, all-position, steer, and trailer axle fitments for use in regional, urban, long haul, and mixed service applications.

Drive axle tires are designed to provide strong traction regardless of the terrain that they’re on, so finding a good one becomes a must. Consider the Bridgestone M729F and [Falken BI 850](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/bi-850) if you need a 245/70R19.5 tire for the drive axle of your truck.

The steer axle is vital to steering, handling, and ride comfort, and is found on the front of a truck. Take a look at the Continental Conti Hybrid HS3, Arisun AS673, and [Kumho KRS03](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/krs030) if you’re looking for a 245/70R19.5 tire that offers great steering and handling performance.

All-position tires can be used on the drive, steer, and trailer axle, making them a great choice for drivers who like versatility. Check out the [Yokohama 104ZR](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/104zr), Firestone FS561, and Hankook Smart Flex AH35 if you want a 245/70R19.5 tire that offers great performance on any axle.

Whether you need a drive, steer, all-position or another tire for your commercial truck, SimpleTire has a set of 245/70R19.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!
